entry.title: Cosmic Mirror: The Jason Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: Cashinx

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,480Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 23

Summary: Sapphire Star crashes into Metropolis like a cosmic enigma an alternate Jason Todd with fiery red hair, a mesmerizing pink Lantern ring, and an electric guitar that shatters the silence of the night. Meanwhile, Red Hood grapples with the realization that this alternate version of himself had the love and support he never got.This is going to be a simple two shot. I don't really plan for more but I just had to make this, it not beta read so please help me with grammar and spelling.

entry.title: Batman's not-so super spectacular week
entry.summary:
Author: N1XX

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,521Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 116

Summary: Batman fights a new villain in Gotham's famous crime alley, only to be hit with a truth serum that lasts for a week, and Superman, oblivious enough to this, hears that his good FRIEND needs assistance, cue to him bringing (convincing) Batman to the watchtower for further testing and for Batman fighting the urge to shut the fuck up and try not to spill any of his obvious and undying love for the man of fucking steel.or Batman confesses to Superman in front of everyone in the JL and will probably cry about it to Alfred when he gets home.

entry.title: one hundred words for shame
entry.summary:
Author: lowtideblood

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,191Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: The Seneschal blinked slowly; the ring translated this as understanding, albeit not without a tinge of disapproval. “As you say, Lantern. We are here in regards to the-,” They said, with a screeching feedback that was either meant to indicate annoyance or an encroaching panic attack- “D’th’yal’yan’tha’stall-Eir’gotuah-si of this place.”[SECOND OF HALF], the ring translates. [denoting caretaker, Watcher, the One Who Remains].”“Oh,” Hal said. Then, in a brilliant moment of word association, stepped aside to motion to Batman with one hand. “He’ll be your guy.”He watched as, immediately, the envoy turned to Batman and fell to their knees in supplication.(Or; A mistranslation during hostile negotiations begins with Batman being dubbed the Caretaker of Earth and ends exactly as you'd expect it to.)

entry.title: aches
entry.summary:
Author: laneyc

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,031Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 315

Summary: “Enough," he spits, startled at the way his hands begin to tremble. He can kill this person with a flash of his eyes. He wants to - he must, and yet his instincts are vehemently against the thought. Something deep within him wants to cradle the broken human. It wants to whisper that everything will be okay and tend to the bloody wounds he's caused.ORRed Kryptonite

entry.title: Of Strongmen and Grumpy Geniuses
entry.summary:
Author: jg3m

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,586Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 101

Summary: Sometimes, it takes encountering another hopeless superhero almost-couple to make you realize what's been staring you in the face the whole time.Alternatively, Bruce and Clark are blown into the Marvel Universe, and Steve and Tony have to work with them to get them home. entry.title: And I don't wanna go home yet
entry.summary:
Author: LuiGarMir

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,859Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 51

Summary: When Clark met Bruce, he didn’t think much of the man. Well, no. He’d had thoughts—a lot of them having to do with his chiseled jaw and strong shoulders—but he hadn’t seen past Batman’s dark, gloomy, unknowable persona.The man—barely a young adult when they met—had been polite and deadly efficient, but also cold and distant.Clark, a journalist at heart, wanted to know more about him, but Superman understood how precious secrecy and privacy were. So… He gave Batman some space.It took him years to discover the man’s civilian name. And it just so happened to be around the same time both men started getting closer. Or it was maybe the reason why they got close at all.

entry.title: Threads to Unveil
entry.summary:
Author: blackwood_ivy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,753Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 60

Summary: Barry prided himself for being smart most of the time. He was quick to notice connections and put pieces together others haven’t even thought of. It was something he was naturally good at but also a skill he perfected over countless years and sleepless nights.However, while Barry prided himself for being perceptive, many have told him how much of an idiot he sometimes could be. How easily he missed the most obvious clues without the input of others.So, when Batman seemed agitated by the prospect of Nightwing joining the Justice League, he wanted to chalk it up to a bad day, a bad week, really a bad life maybe, but something in his gut told him to pay attention.(or: 5 times Barry notices Batman act unusual around certain people and decides to observe. He doesn't connect the dots. 1 time they're shoved into his face and he connects them.)

entry.title: pink in the night
entry.summary:
Author: QuietLittleVoices

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,984Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: They’d been meeting up like this more often in the last few months.Clark would show up, sometimes called on and sometimes on a whim, and they’d take a drink in Bruce’s study by the fire. Sometimes before Bruce left for patrol, sometimes after he came back, and most often on nights when the kids were covering it. It had taken a long time but, somewhat recently, Bruce had started to realize he had to take more time off if he wanted to be as effective as he could be.Or: Clark shows up, finds a photo album, and asks Bruce about it.

entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,177Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 845

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!

entry.title: Single Dad Saturdays
entry.summary:
Author: Sugarof5oaks

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,333Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Logan Howlett never thought he would need a partner. OK, maybe need is not the right word. Logan would like a partner; however, when you are a single dad of five kids ranging in age from high school to preschool, your dating pool is very slim. However, that all can change one day when his nosy neighbors, who are best friends, decide to help with his dating life. Not to mention the sexy new neighbor that tolerates Logan's brooding behavior, will Logan find love, or will his temper close off opportunities that prevent him from finding love again?
